title: Nixon: from Checkers to Watergate
creator_credit: Charles Braverman, Ken Rudolf and Braverman Productions
brief_description: A compilation of archival stills and motion picture photography showing Nixon’s speeches, interviews and press conferences as candidate, congressman, vice-president and president.
